description: Variation of operating hours permitted on 27th March 2000 (decision reference P00/0351) to allow trading to continue beyond the currently approved closing hour of 12 midnight on Friday and Saturday nights until 2am on the following morning.
decision_conditions: INFORMATIVE:  The Local Planning Authority will be unlikely to consider favourably any future submission to extend operating hours at these premises without a qualified acoustic consultant having first undertaken a noise survey in line with British Standard 4142:1997, on the basis of which any necessary sound insulation measures have been identified and have been undertaken to the satisfaction of the Authority.  Please note that advice should be sought from the Local Planning Authority as to whether planning permission will be necessary for any external works involved and that any necessary permission should be obtained prior to that portion of the works being undertaken.
